GapFillInput.Title: Present continuous
GapFillInput.Instruction: Write the correct form of the Present continuous using the verb and person in brackets.

Content.Question:
1. Hi Maria. Listen, I'm working (I / work) late tonight.
2. Jackie! What are you doing (you / do)?
3. Can I phone you back? We're watching (we / watch) a DVD at the moment.
4. No, it isn't raining|it's not raining (it / not / rain) here.
5. Iâ€™m sorry. He's having (he / have) lunch at the moment.
6. Why are we waiting (we / wait)?
7. Yuri isn't running|Yuri's not running (Yuri / not / run) today.
8. I'm sitting (I / sit) on a bus.
9. The children are playing (children / play) in the garden.
10. Is Ray coming (Ray / come) with us?
11. My daughter's getting (daughter / get) married today!
